name: Square Circle Media
overview:
Square Circle are a full-service creative agency offering innovative and effective solutions to our clients. Our winning formula combines talent, experience and enthusiasm to deliver effective results on time and on budget.

Our interdisciplinary team create emotional digital experiences across multiple technologies, platforms and media. Our works can be seen across a wide variety of industries including consumer electronics, telecommunications, media & entertainment, fashion, retail, legal, education and finance.

Our team form a creative melting pot where visuals artists, designers, developers and producers strive to create digital experiences that excite, challenge, motivate and engage.

Square Circle works with the worldâ€™s leading companies and our clients include: BBC, Thomsons, JCC Lighting, O2, Salans, E4 , MoD, RIBA and LG Electronics.
